[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Hey, did I tell you that I went to the post office today?
No, you didn't. What did you do there?
I paid for postage to send a package. It was a bit of a hassle, but I got it done.
That's good. I hate going to the post office. It's always so crowded.
Yeah, it was pretty busy today. But I needed to get this package sent out.
Speaking of packages, remember that time when you got stranded because you couldn't drive yourself home from a night out with friends?
Ugh, don't remind me. That was such a disaster.

[MEMORY]

It's never too late to make a positive change.' }
